name: FlyingChancla
0:
”Alexa, launch Flying Chancla”
”Alexa, start Flying Chancla”
”Alexa, open Flying Chancla”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flying chancla
des:
-Discover the feel of throwing your Chancla through the room just like a real Mexican Mom. 
-Just launch the skill and you'll hear one of 5 short sounds of a Flying Chancla (Sandal) all across the room. 
-If you want to hear it again, just start the skill again.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
